scripts.clean-android-dev: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npm run android-dev
scripts.build-android-stage-apk: cd android && cross-env ENVFILE=.env.stage node ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f .env.android ./gradlew assembleStageRelease
scripts.build-android-prod-apk: cd android && cross-env ENVFILE=.env.prod node ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f .env.android ./gradlew assembleProdRelease
scripts.build-android-stage: cd android && cross-env ENVFILE=.env.stage node ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f .env.android ./gradlew bundleStageRelease
scripts.build-android-prod: cd android && cross-env ENVFILE=.env.prod node ../node_modules/.bin/env-cmd -f .env.android ./gradlew bundleProdRelease
